column1: 2025-11-04 16:07:58,Suryakumar Yadav names Axar Patel as India’s ‘unsung hero’ across all formats,Divy Dubey,1 hour ago,https://www.sportingnews.com/in/cricket/news/suryakumar-yadav-axar-patel-india-unsung-hero-formats/17d552ca7256496d33bb4cb1,"India's T20I skipper Suryakumar Yadav heaped praise on all-rounder Axar Patel, calling him the team's ""unsung hero"" for his consistent performances across formats.As India and Australia battle it out in a tightly-contestedT20I series, Suryakumar's comments highlight the growing respect within the dressing room for Axar's quiet but impactful role.The Sporting News as a preferred news sourceDespite often being away from the spotlight, Axar has been one of India's most dependable performers in recent years — contributing crucial runs down the order and delivering under pressure with the ball.Suryakumar Yadav praises Axar Patel's clutch performancesSpeaking on journalistVimal Kumar's YouTube channel, Suryakumar said Axar stands out for his composure and reliability across formats.""If I had to describe him in two words, he is the unsung hero. Whether it's T20s, ODIs, or Tests, he has performed solidly everywhere,"" Suryakumar said.More:‘Women’s team got World Cup trophy immediately’: BCCI seeks justice from ICC as India Men’s still await Asia CupHe added, ""He bowls during tough moments — in the powerplay, the 19th or 20th over, and always delivers. Whenever the game gets tight, I just look at him. He doesn't say much, just runs up, hands his cap to the umpire, and gets the job done.""The Indian captain also revealed that Axar often volunteers to bowl in the most demanding situations, showing his self-belief and leadership on the field.More:Renuka Singh’s mother goes viral celebrating India’s Women’s Cricket World Cup 2025 victory: WATCHWhen will Axar Patel be in action next?Axar will next be in action during the fourth T20I of the India vs Australia series on November 6 at Bill Pippen Oval, Gold Coast. With the series level at 1-1 (one game washed out), India will rely on his all-round skills to edge ahead in the contest.Axar's quiet consistency has made him an integral part of India's white-ball setup — a player who may not always headline the news, but often defines the result.RELATED LINKS:India's white-ball tour of Australia: Schedule, Results, Dates, Venues and squads for Australia vs India ODI and T20I series in 2025When does the Ashes 2025/26 start? 2025-11-04 16:08:05,"When is the Ayodhya Premier League 2025? Schedule, Results and Format",Xaviour Raymond,38 minutes ago,https://www.sportingnews.com/in/cricket/news/ayodhya-premier-league-2025-schedule-results-format-live-streaming/84e05272ab17b43d263133af,"The Ayodhya Premier League (APL) 2025 is set to kick off on November 9 at the Dr. Bhimrao Ambedkar International Sports Complex in Ayodhya.The inaugural season will feature eight teams including Saryu Smasher, Manorama Marbles, Hindon Titans, Yamuna Super Kings, Chambal Chargers, Betwa Blasters, Ganga Warriors, and Gomti Thunder, competing across 28 league matches until November 23.The tournament will open with Saryu Smasher facing Manorama Marbles in the first match at 10 a.m. Each team will play seven league games, with the semi-finals scheduled for November 24 and the final on November 26. The APL aims to promote regional cricketing talent and bring top-level action to one of India’s most historic cities.BET NOW:Cricket Matches Today
column3: Live Sports Betting in IndiaBet Now:Get 150% deposit match up to ₹150,000 when you sign up for a new account with Dafabet. Click here to claim.Ayodhya Premier League 2025 Schedule: Fixtures and ResultsThe league stage of APL 2025 spans from November 9 to 23, delivering double-headers on most days for non-stop excitement. Matches kick off at 10:00 AM, with evening clashes where applicable. Here's the day-by-day fixture list, based on official announcements:Ayodhya Premier League 2025: Live stream, TV ChannelAll matches of the Ayodhya Premier League 2025 will be available for live streaming on theDafabetwebsite.Fans can watch every match bysigning up on Dafabetand accessing the live sports section.Live scores, results, and match updates will also be available through Dafabet’s sports page during the tournament.READ MORE:Sanju Samson IPL 2026
column5: Virat Kohli IPL 2026DafabetBEST CRICKET ODDS AND OFFERSCLICK TO BETAyodhya Premier League 2025 Format ExplainedAPL 2025 adopts a classic T20 structure mirroring theIPL's intensity while keeping it rooted in local flavour. Here's a breakdown:Teams and League Stage: Eight franchises compete in a single round-robin format where each team plays seven matches (totaling 28 league games). Points are awarded as follows: 2 for a win, 1 for a no-result, and 0 for a loss, with net run rate as the tiebreaker.Qualifiers: The top four teams from the league table advance to the playoffs.Playoffs: Two semifinals on November 24 determine the finalists, with the winners clashing in the grand final on November 26. No third-place playoff is scheduled.Match Rules: Standard T20 regulations apply, including a 20-over innings per side, powerplays, and strategic timeouts. Umpires and scorers from the Uttar Pradesh Cricket Association (UPCA) panel will officiate, with third-umpire technology for key decisions.Squads: Each team will have a mix of local trial winners and guest players, capped at 18-22 members.Where is the Ayodhya Premier League 2025 2025?The Ayodhya Premier League 2025 will be played entirely at the Dr. Bhimrao Ambedkar International Cricket Stadium in Ayodhya. The modern 40,000-capacity venue, opened in 2024, features world-class pitches, floodlights, and comfortable seating for fans. Located near the Saryu River, the stadium is about 15 km from Maharishi Valmiki International Airport (AYJ).

column1: 2025-11-04 16:08:12,‘How did you succeed in both ODI and T20I cricket?’ — Suryakumar Yadav reveals one question he’d ask South Africa legend AB de Villiers,Divy Dubey,5 minutes ago,https://www.sportingnews.com/in/cricket/news/succeed-odi-t20i-sky-question-sa-legend-ab-de-villiers/1970b73f0486174e9ab2a5f3,India's T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav has opened up about his ambitions to return to ODI cricket and the lessons he hopes to learn from one of his idols, AB de Villiers.The 35-year-old admitted that while he has excelled in T20Is, finding the right rhythm in the 50-over format has been a struggle — something he wants to fix before it's too late.Add The Sporting News as a preferred news sourceHaving last played an ODI in the 2023 World Cup final, Suryakumar now wants to understand how players like de Villiers mastered both formats with such ease and consistency.Suryakumar Yadav seeks AB de Villiers' advice to suceed in ODIsSpeaking on journalist Vimal Kumar's YouTube channel, Suryakumar revealed that he has not had an in-depth chat with de Villiers yet, but if given a chance, he knows exactly what he would ask.""If I meet him soon, I want to ask him how he balanced his T20I and ODI game — because I haven't been able to do it,"" Suryakumar said.More:'Australia play to win and England play for moral victory’ - David Warner's brutal sledge ahead of 2025 Ashes Test seriesHe added, ""I thought ODIs should be played like T20Is. I want to know what he did to succeed in both formats. AB, if you are listening, please get in touch with me quickly. The next three to four years are very important for me, and I am really keen on playing ODI cricket too.""Suryakumar also admitted that his inability to adapt between formats was a major reason for his ODI omission, adding that de Villiers' all-format dominance continues to inspire him.View this post on InstagramA post shared by Vimal Kumar (@vimalwa)More:""The No. 1 ODI ranking has walked up to his doorstep"" - Former India star lavishes praise on Rohit SharmaCan Suryakumar Yadav play the 2027 ODI World Cup?Suryakumar made his ODI debut in 2021 and has played 37 matches so far. Though he is currently focused on leading India's T20I side, his intent to return to 50-over cricket suggests he is not ruling out another shot at the format.The next ODI World Cup is set for 2027 in South Africa, Zimbabwe, and Namibia — a timeline that gives Suryakumar nearly two years to rebuild his ODI credentials. If he can translate his T20 success into the longer white-ball format, a comeback is not out of the question.As one of India's most innovative batters, his evolution across formats could well decide whether he features in that tournament.RELATED LINKS:What did Virat Kohli say about playing the 2027 World CupIndia's white-ball tour of Australia: Schedule, Fixtures, Dates, Venues and Squads for Australia vs India ODI and T20I series in 2025All the latest cricket news

2025-11-04 16:08:19,"Pakistan vs South Africa 1st ODI: TV channel, online live stream and how to watch PAK vs SA ODIs from India",Saurav Goyal,2 hours ago,https://www.sportingnews.com/in/cricket/news/pakistan-south-africa-1st-odi-tv-channel-online-live-stream-odis-india/6ef0b01bb38287151ade6774,"After a convincing T20I series win, Pakistan are set to face South Africa in a fresh three-match ODI series.The Men in Green, now under new ODI skipper Shaheen Afridi, will look to carry their winning momentum into the 50-over format. The series opener will be held at the Iqbal Stadium in Faisalabad.The Sporting News as a preferred news sourcePakistan recently suffered poor runs in ODIs, including disappointing results against New Zealand and West Indies.With the 2027 World Cup in sight, this series marks an important step in rebuilding their form and testing new leadership against a strong South African side.When is Pakistan vs South Africa 1st ODI taking place?The first ODI between Pakistan and South Africa is scheduled for Sunday, November 3 and will start at 3:30 PM IST.Where is Pakistan vs South Africa 1st ODI taking place?The first ODI between Pakistan and South Africa will be played at the Iqbal Stadium in Faisalabad.More:‘Knew it was her day’: Harmanpreet Kaur thrilled as gut feel on Shafali Varma powers India to Women's World Cup 2025 winWhere to watch Pakistan vs South Africa 1st ODI live on TV in India?Unfortunately, the Pakistan vs South Africa ODI series will not be televised in India.How to watch Pakistan vs South Africa 1st ODI online live stream in India?The first ODI between Pakistan and South Africa will be streamed live in India on theSports TVYouTube channel.RELATED LINKS:India's white-ball tour of Australia: Schedule, Results, Dates, Venues and squads for Australia vs India ODI and T20I series in 2025When does the Ashes 2025/26 start? 2025-11-04 16:08:26,‘I am ready with my guitar, Sir’ — Jemimah Rodrigues reacts to Sunil Gavaskar’s promise to sing with her after India’s Women’s World Cup 2025 win",Divy Dubey,38 minutes ago,https://www.sportingnews.com/in/cricket/news/ready-guitar-jemimah-rodrigues-sunil-gavaskars-sing-inds-ws-wc-2025-win/c66f185f54ab775a51f86f66,"India's long wait for a Women's World Cup trophy ended with a memorable win over South Africa in Navi Mumbai, and celebrations have taken a heart-warming turn online. Among those joining the cheer is Jemimah Rodrigues, one of India's standout performers in the tournament.The Sporting News as a preferred news sourceIn an exchange, Rodrigues responded to a special promise made by cricket legend Sunil Gavaskar — one that combines cricket, music, and a touch of nostalgia.Jemimah Rodrigues responds to Sunil Gavaskar's promise to sing with herAfter India's 52-run win in the 2025 Women's World Cup final at the DY Patil Stadium, Rodrigues posted a video on Instagram addressing Gavaskar's earlier remark about a potential jam session.More:Explained: Why R Ashwin won’t play Big Bash League 2025/26 as Sydney Thunder gives knee injury updateIn her message, the 25-year-old said she was ""ready with my guitar"" and hoped the former India captain was ""ready with your mic.""""Hi Sunil Gavaskar, sir. I saw your message and you said that if India wins the World Cup, we will sing a song together. I am ready with my guitar, hope you are ready with your mic. Lots of love, sir, thank you for everything,"" Jemimah said.View this post on InstagramA post shared by Jemimah Jessica Rodrigues (@jemimahrodrigues)More:Suryakumar Yadav names Axar Patel as India’s ‘unsung hero’ across all formatsGavaskar's offer before the finalA day before the final, Gavaskar had told Sports Today that he would love to sing along with Rodrigues if India lifted the trophy — a callback to their impromptu duet during the BCCI Awards in 2024.""If India win the World Cup, she and I, if she is okay with it, will sing a song together. She will have her guitar, and I will sing along. We actually did that once at a BCCI event. I would love to do it again — if she is happy to do that with an old man, I am all for it,"" Gavaskar said.The post-win exchange between Gavaskar and Rodrigues has added a joyful, human touch to India's greatest moment in women's cricket — one that fans hope will lead to a real duet soon.RELATED LINKS:India's white-ball tour of Australia: Schedule, Results, Dates, Venues and squads for Australia vs India ODI and T20I series in 2025When does the Ashes 2025/26 start? Full schedule for next Australia vs England five-match Test seriesIndia squad for Rising Stars Asia Cup 2025 announced: Jitesh Sharma set to captain with Vaibhav Suryavanshi as opening batterAll the latest cricket news
